thread.title: Bush's 4 saves help Impact play Galaxy to 0-0 draw
thread.title_full: Bush's 4 saves help Impact play Galaxy to 0-0 draw - Yahoo Sports

author: sports.yahoo.com
title: Bush's 4 saves help Impact play Galaxy to 0-0 draw
text:
CARSON, Calif. (AP) -- Evan Bush had four saves and posted his fifth shutout of the season to help the Montreal Impact play the Los Angeles Galaxy to a 0-0 tie Saturday night.
The Impact (9-11-5) had a pair of early scoring opportunities and another late in the match, but Donovan Ricketts , who finished with five saves for the Galaxy, used acrobatic saves and great positioning to thwart the Montreal attacks.
Ignacio Piatti found Justin Mapp on a break, but his left-footer toward the far post was poked away by the right hand of a diving Ricketts in the first minute.
About 6 minutes later, Piatti split four defenders a fired a shot from the top of the box but, once again, Ricketts dove a slapped it away. Andres Romero slammed home the rebound from the left flank, but was called offside.
The Galaxy (13-8-8) are winless, and scoreless, in their last two matches after averaging 4.3 goals per game during a four-game winning streak that ended with a 1-0 loss as San Jose on Aug. 28. Los Angeles sits a point behind first-place Vancouver in the Western Conference standings.
